alert.note: Alert for Clay (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 8:35PM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Flooding in low areas on the left bank is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday morning to a crest of 23.1 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning around midnight. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Tibbee Creek Tibbee 23.0 14.8 Mon 7 pm CST 21.7 23.1 22.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued early Tuesday morning by 10 AM CST.
